Name: Escape Rebooted
About the game: Escape Rebooted is a 2D platformer puzzle game where the only lights are you and the end of the level. You must find your way into each levels while avoiding spikes and using anything you can find to reach the end! Each levels will test your jumping and problem solving skills. The more levels you manage to finish, the more complex a level is gonna be.
